Protect your property.
Intellectual, technological or digital.
Let's Talk

What do you get?

legal advice tailored to your business needs.

Service

Legal United provides legal services and consultancy in intellectual property law and internet law. Especially when it comes to research, technological and legal development and International dynamics, Legal United combines these multiple factors in order to give a clear understanding of the situation at hand.

Method

An intrinsic approach in (International) intellectual- and internet law is what drives Legal United. Looking at the bigger picture while understanding the issues at hand, matters are innately mannered creating a thorough yet practical and, when needed, strategical advice.

Client

Are you a business or startup looking for practical or legal advice? Is your practice or law firm in need of (temporarily) extra help? Legal United provides hands on legal work when you are looking for flexible legal work, whether it's about research, advice, practical decisions or thorough feedback.

About

Why Legal United is qualified to help.

  • A lawyer with a passion for learning

    Jantine is known for her personal and open approach, conducting the bigger picture into the smaller issue. She enjoys working in an International environment, feels at home in groups yet likes to work independantly as well.

  • The Practice

    Jantine started Legal United and has worked with startups, small law firms, independant professionals and retail on matters of copyright, contract law, internet law and trademark law. From researching the legal parameters to creating and fine-tuning creative concepts, Legal United focusses on the individual matter.

  • In the heart of Amsterdam

    You'll find Legal United in the centre of Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

info@legal-united.com

Let's discuss your business needs.
